title: championship riven (OG version)
body: Is riot able to transfer a championship riven skin the OG version to my account if me and an owner of an account with the skin agrees? -(OG meaning the PAX code edition)

replies.body: We're not able to swap content between accounts, or gift skins between accounts.  :(  Championship Riven is still obtainable, though, her skin is a bit different in the newer version.  Sorry friend!
